Load Open Payments General Data

Source: R/catalog_open.R
open_general.Rd

Load Open Payments General Data

Usage

open_general()

Value

<list> of Open Payments API general data

Examples

open_general()
#> $title
#> [1] "General Payment Data"
#> 
#> $description
#> [1] "All general (non-research, non-ownership related) payments from the program year"
#> 
#> $modified
#> [1] "2025-01-30"
#> 
#> $years
#> [1] 2017 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023
#> 
#> $nrows
#> [1] 14607336
#> 
#> $nfields
#> [1] 91
#> 
#> $endpoints
#> # A tibble: 7 × 3
#>    year identifier                           downloadurl                        
#>   <int> <chr>                                <chr>                              
#> 1  2023 fb3a65aa-c901-4a38-a813-b04b00dfa2a9 https://download.cms.gov/openpayme…
#> 2  2022 df01c2f8-dc1f-4e79-96cb-8208beaf143c https://download.cms.gov/openpayme…
#> 3  2021 0380bbeb-aea1-58b6-b708-829f92a48202 https://download.cms.gov/openpayme…
#> 4  2020 a08c4b30-5cf3-4948-ad40-36f404619019 https://download.cms.gov/openpayme…
